ResearchProjectDef.label: gunpowder
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft early muzzle loading weapons and black powder ammunition.

ResearchProjectDef.label: simple launchers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the production of basic grenade and rocket launchers.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced launchers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the production of more advanced launchers and munitions like the incendiary, triple rocket, or doomsday launcher and time-fuzed explosives.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced ammunition
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the production of advanced ammunition for small arms and light weapons systems like armor-piercing incendiary, sabot, and high-explosive rounds.

ResearchProjectDef.label: basic optoelectronics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the production of simple electro-optical devices, like night vision goggles.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced optoelectronics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the production of more advanced and specialized electro-optical devices, including better night vision goggles.
